  • Constructor Details

    • Battle

      public Battle(GameController game)
      Constructs a new battle to be fought.
      Parameters:
      game - the game controller being passed through to stay synchronised.

  • Method Details

    • getBattleMonsters

      public ArrayList<Monster> getBattleMonsters()

    • getGold

      public int getGold()

    • setScore

      public void setScore(int score)

    • getScore

      public int getScore()

    • generateBattleMonsters

      public void generateBattleMonsters()
      Generates a random list of monsters that are a part of the battle. The number and levels of the monsters varies with the current in game day.

    • fightBattle

      public boolean fightBattle(ArrayList<Monster> playerTeam)
      Allows the players monsters to fight the opposing monsters.
      Parameters:
      playerTeam - the players fighting monsters in the correct order
      Returns:
      true or false depending on if the battle was won by the player.

    • defeatMonster

      public void defeatMonster(Monster monster)
      If a monster loses to a player this is run to update the score, gold, and remove the fainted monster
      Parameters:
      monster - the monster that has been defeated.

    • battleEndWin

      public void battleEndWin(ArrayList<Monster> playerTeam)
      The end of a battle when the player has one. This updates the players scores and gold depending on what they won during battle. It also makes sure to update the players monsters healths and statuses.
      Parameters:
      playerTeam - the players team of monsters they fought with.

    • battleEndLoss

      public void battleEndLoss()
      The end of a battle when the player loses. Ensures that the players monsters health isn't an incorrect value and sets their fainted status to true.
